solution_line_template: Since there are {mittens_fewer_than_plugs} fewer mittens pairs than the plugs, there are {mittens_pairs}+{mittens_fewer_than_plugs} = {initial_plugs_pairs} pairs of plugs.

When Gunner decides to add {added_plugs_pairs} more plugs pairs into the box of plugs, the number of plug pairs increases to {initial_plugs_pairs}+{added_plugs_pairs} = <<{initial_plugs_pairs}+{added_plugs_pairs}={final_plugs_pairs}>>{final_plugs_pairs}
Since a pair has two, the {final_plugs_pairs} pairs of plugs total {final_plugs_pairs}*{items_per_pair} = <<{final_plugs_pairs}*{items_per_pair}={total_plugs}>>{total_plugs} plugs.
